name: The Loud Ranger: Fighter 12/ Wm 7/ Ranger 1
author: Valerfor

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Well, i thought Mick was feeling lonely here so i decided to post one of my lvl 20 builds to make him some company

Seriously though, we need more lvl 20 & lvl 30 builds as many of the players that come here nowdays are either venture in such worlds or they play the OC/SOU/HoTU & modules.

The Loud Ranger

Ftr 12/ Wm 7/ Ranger 1

RACE: Half - Orc

ALIGNMENT: Any (True Neutral, recommended)

PLAYABILITY: PvM & PvP 1-20

STARTING STATS:
STR - 19
DEX - 13

INT - 14

CHA - 06

SPECIAL NOTES:

Ok, nothing new here but a trusted weapon's master with maximum AB & damage. In addition he has the option to use Ranger items and scrolls (freedom, prot. from elements, e.t.c) and set deadly traps just in case he needs that. This build in a moderate magic environment should deal over 200 dmg /crit easily, so almost all of your opponents should be dead after the first flurry. If not, you have the option to turn into improved expertise mode and wait for that devastating scythe critical to come in, decimating your foes.

Now, this character has every intention to hide but he does a rather big noise while tries that...

OK, now I don't feel lonely anymore

As for the build; a strong warrior with high AB and some scary crits!

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
For the record, I would take that last level as Rogue for a Tumble and UMD dump + 1d6 SA. No such thing as too much damage. Otherwise, I would exchange Power Attack with Toughness (delay IE one level, take Toughness at Fighter 11 and IE at Fighter 12).

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Max, the reason i do not take a 3/4 bab class is that i will loosee AB and not because i feel that +1d6 sneak is useless.

Ranger served well this build with its class scrolls and set traps while maintaining the abolute highest Str-based AB, or else i would go with Human 10/3/7 set-up and grabbing that evasion too, since i was there.

Which is probably the sanest decision.. But - just not for this guy.
